participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and independent with a passion for fitness and art.
participant_1.background: I work out in my home gym to keep fit. I like to make jewelry out of silver wire and beads. I like Katy Perry as a musician. I do not like feeling controlled. Sometimes, I like to relieve myself when on roses.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and artistic, with a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket. My right foot only has 3 toes. I sometimes like to listen to music while I drive my old car. I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well. I love to shop.

content.text: How do you like your free time?
I usually spend it shopping or photographing beautiful things, I love to capture the world around me, even if I'm not feeling well.
That's really cool. I like to make jewelry out of silver wire and beads, or work out in my home gym to keep fit.
That's so cool! I love jewelry, I'd love to see some of yours.
Sure, I have a whole shop on Etsy actually. It's www.etsy.com/shop/TheSilverSnail.
Thanks! What do you like to listen to when you're driving?
I love Katy Perry! I also like a lot of older music, like the Beatles.
I love Katy Perry too, she's amazing! I also like a lot of different music, but mostly rock.
Cool, what are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Beatles, The Who, and Pink Floyd.
I love The Beatles! I've never really listened to The Who or Pink Floyd, but I'll check them out.
Awesome, I'm sure you'll like them!
